answers.author: Susan Thorpe
answers.text:
the City of Peoria AZ did an RFP for CAD/RMS for our Police Department. If this wuold be helpful to you, let me know your email address and I can forward it to you from our Materials Management division. 
Susan

answers.author: Tim McCarty
answers.text:
The City of Walla Walla would very much appreciate a copy of your RFP for CAD/RMS. Please send it to me at tmccarty@ci.walla-walla.wa.us . Thank you and Happy Holidays!


The City of Walla Walla would very much appreciate a copy of your RFP for CAD/RMS. Please send it to me at tmccarty@ci.walla-walla.wa.us . Thank you and Happy Holidays!

answers.author: Susan Thorpe
answers.text:
I've attached our RFP for CAD/RMS services. I hope this is helpful.

answers.author: Tim McCarty
answers.text:
Very much appreciated, Susan. I've passed the RFP on to Police Chief Scott Bieber, who will be leading the procurement process in 2013.
Thanks and Happy New Year!

author: John Jones
text: Getting ready to prepare RFP for a CAD system - any other gov't entities care to share (rather than re-create the wheel)? Thanks-
title: RFP for CAD
